name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Spirit of Sanada
description: Struggle for Survival. Death before Surrender! Follow the Legend of the Sanada Clan from Their Heroic rise to the Tragic Fall of Yukimura. Experience new and unique "Castle Towns" and detailed 3D maps. Prepare for campaigns and use your skills to survive "Multi-Stage Battles". Fight through epic military confrontations, real-time day/night system affects victory conditions! New charismatic characters add to the story: The long-awaited Masayuki Sanada and others join to tell the valiant tale of the Sanada!
